definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The warming and drying of the climate in the plateau resulted in the decending of climate-productivity.
sentences.chinese: 黃土高原氣候暖幹化使作物氣候生產力下降。

sentences.english: Irrigated farming is the primary kind of agricultures in mess plateau.
sentences.chinese: 黃土高原自然條件特殊，耕作農業以引水灌溉爲主。

sentences.english: The adaptability of meadow brome is very strong in the most parts of the Loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 牧場草在黃土高原大部分地區的適應性很強。

sentences.english: Neotectonics was the dominant factor of the environmental evolution of Loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 新構造運動是黃土高原區域環境變遷的主導性因素。

sentences.english: The normal region is cold irrigated areas of Loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 適宜黃土高原冷涼區水地種植。

sentences.english: I was born in Shanxi Ocher Plateau and grow up beside the beautiful Yangtse River.
sentences.chinese: 出生在中國的黃土高原陝西，生長在美麗的長江邊。

sentences.english: At last classification scheme of the anti-scourability of soil in Loess Plateau has been drawn up initially.
sentences.chinese: 最後還初步擬定黃土高原土壤抗衝性分級方案。

sentences.english: It provides scientific basis for the soil erosion control in the Loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 研究結果可爲黃土高原水土流失治理提供科學依據。

sentences.english: This is a reminiscences on the investigation of the loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 這是一篇考察黃土高原的回憶錄。

sentences.english: Gully is one of the basic landform configuration in loess plateau.
sentences.chinese: 溝壑是黃土高原的基本地貌形態之一。

sentences.english: Loess Plateau possesses its inherent natural resources features and a long history of development.
sentences.chinese: 黃土高原有其自身的自然資源特徵，其開發歷史悠久。

sentences.english: The expansive Loess Plateau shows its nimble nymphalness wherever there is a stream.
sentences.chinese: 對於廣袤的黃土高原，水就是靈秀的化身。

sentences.english: Decide the loess plateau modes of life and relation to their environment that the area has different kind on the west weak environment.
sentences.chinese: 定西地區具有不同類型的黃土高原生態脆弱環境。

sentences.english: Brahmaputra Grand Canyon is the biggest canyon in the world.
sentences.chinese: 黃土高原是世界最大的黃土地貌。

sentences.english: Huangma soil on the plain is the main cultivated soil on the Loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 塬地黃麻土是黃土高原的主要土種。

sentences.english: The armies campaigned in the northern Loess Plateau, modern Ningxia and the Huanghe floodplain.
sentences.chinese: 競選的軍隊在北部黃土高原，現代寧夏黃河漫灘。

definition: Daxing'anling mountain range in northwest Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China/Daxing'anling prefecture
Qilian county in Haibei Tibetan autonomous prefecture 海北藏族自治州[Hai3 bei3 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
Qinling mountain range in Shaanxi forming natural barrier between Guanzhong plain 關中平原|关中平原[Guan1 zhong1 ping2 yuan2] and Han River 漢水|汉水[Han4 shui3] valley
Yunnan and Guizhou plateau in southwest China, covering east Yunnan, whole of Guizhou, west of Guangxi and southern margins of Sichuan, Hubei and Hunan
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
Yumen Pass, or Jade Gate, western frontier post on the Silk Road in the Han Dynasty, west of Dunhuang, in Gansu

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: lit. men's footprints are rare (idiom)/fig. off the beaten track/lonely/deserted
